data.client_settings: Release Channel: stable, Build Number: 17618, Version Hash: d279ff17194f8412b207e6656d100fbb9e095f46
data.actual_result: It stays as if you are still hovering over the game.
data.expected_result: It disappears even though it's been clicked, and maybe the menu shouldn't be there if the game isn't installed and you don't have dev tools on.
data.short_description: Dots (kebab) menu in the new games tab appears and disappears when hovered over, but stops disappearing once clicked.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the new Games Tab - Hover over a game in the "What's new" section - Play button and a menu button appear - Stop hovering, they disappear - Click menu, if developer tools is on "Copy id" will be a option, if the game is installed "Play game" is an option, otherwise it does nothing - Stop hovering - Menu and play button doesn't disappear
